title: Riot pls, no more Gragas figures!
body:
I thought we were friends, Riot. But obviously I was mistaken. 

I ordered both the series 1 Urf figure, and recently the series 2 Urf figure, and as you know they come with a free RANDOM figure too. Well, last time I received Gragas. And today when I opened my package, do you know what I found???

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} 

Be cool, guys. Be cool :'(

replies.body: wow how odd, same thing happened to my gf;P <3
